name: IschemicHeartDisease
title: Ischemic heart disease
description: OP-13 is the measure ID associated with the codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-9 codes associated with ischemic heart disease.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have ischemic heart disease.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-9 codes associated with ischemic heart disease are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Values that are not associated with ischemic heart disease, or those captured in systems other than ICD-9, are excluded from the value set.)
